duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop recruiting processes for each job vacancy and department need.

Work directly with candidates during the recruiting and hiring process to keep them informed and be their direct contact at Clipboard Health.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of education and experience. At least 2 years full cycle recruiting for Technical positions
